lead_paragraph: Correll Buckhalter took a shovel pass from Donovan McNabb and ran 48 yards for a touchdown as Philadelphia beat host Baltimore, 20-10. McNabb was 6 for 10 passing for 97 yards.
snippet: Correll Buckhalter took a shovel pass from Donovan McNabb and ran 48 yards for a touchdown as Philadelphia beat host Baltimore, 20-10. McNabb was 6 for 10 passing for 97 yards.
